name: AF-Khimera
description:
Animus Formula - Khimera (AF-K) puts the player in the cockpit of a mechanized weapon in an 8-bit pixel setting on Jupiter's moon, Callisto.

Tasked with uncovering the mystery of why the Zeta outpost's communications with Mars went silent, the player must venture through 9 missions with top down shooting mechanics and radial maneuvers as they fight off security drones and other mysteries within Zeta.

Deep into the reaches of our solar system, on a moon of Jupiter by the name of Callisto, lies the Zeta research facility.

Zeta is home to the greatest scientific minds in the system.  It is also home to the greatest threats to mankind ever conceived in a Petri dish.

Approximately 2 months ago, Zeta ceased all communications with their proxy receiver on Mars, prompting an investigation by Mars High Command.

A team of specialists has been sent to assess damages to the facility and act as necessary to quell any threats.

AF-K
